column5: would appreciate some info. on the Walleye/Muskie bite on the Winnipeg River or LOTW (North Basin). Am planning to go this week-end and the week of Oct. 9. Thanks

Everyone who has been at Pine Falls recently has been raving about catching large walleye, and lots of them. I will also be there that week. I'll be running an Alumacraft 175 and Yamaha F100 tiller. If you see me wave me over..well have a coffee.Lawrence
